Name: maximize_project_priority
Description: Assign teams to projects with the highest priority.

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Prioritize features with the highest value for development.

Name: maximize_story_points_in_sprint
Description: Maximize the number of story points completed per sprint to increase output.

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Ensure team morale and satisfaction are high

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Complete user stories with the minimum amount of task effort to improve efficiency.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence
Description: Focus on features relevant to stakeholders with the highest influence.

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Increase the average story points a team can handle in a sprint.

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Reduce the impact of high-severity blockers on development progress.

Name: maximize_budget_utilization
Description: Ensure the allocated project budget is used effectively.

Name: maximize_epic_priority
Description: Prioritize work on epics that have the highest strategic importance.

Name: maximize_worker_availability
Description: Optimize task assignments based on maximizing the available time of workers.

Name: minimize_effort_for_high_priority_features
Description: Specifically reduce the effort for features that are marked as high priority.
